name: ZOETIS
goal: Zoetis discovers, develops, manufactures and markets veterinary vaccines and medicines, complemented by diagnostic products and genetic tests, biodevices and supported by a range of services. Zoetis serves veterinarians, livestock producers and people who raise and care for farm and companion animals.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: EU Animal welfare policy; proposal for a Regulation on Veterinay medicinal products; proposal for a Regulation on the manufacture, placing on the market and use of medicated feed; EU Framework program for research & innovation; organic farming regulation; regulation on Mercury.
